mapper.select: SELECT borrow_id as borrowId, borrow_user_id as borrowUserId, borrow_title as borrowTitle, deadline as deadline, repayment_time as repaymentTime, total_amount as totalAmount, principal as principal, interest as interest, period as period, state as state, borrow_type as borrowType, repayment_type as repaymentType, create_time as createTime FROM t_repayment WHERE borrow_user_id = #{borrowUserId}
